action.name: Multiattack.
action.effect: The captain makes three melee attacks: two with its scimitar and one with its dagger. Or the captain makes two ranged attacks with its daggers.

action.name: Scimitar.
action.effect: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (ld6 + 3) slashing damage.

action.name: Dagger.
action.effect: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage.

reaction.name: Parry.
reaction.effect: The captain adds 2 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the captain must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.
